stimulusHtml:
Press record to begin each response to the conversation.

Response 1

features.html:
Directions: You will participate in a simulated conversation. When it is your turn to speak, you will have 20 seconds to record. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible.

 

You are a foreign student in China, having a conversation with your Chinese teacher, Gao Line, about a birthday party for an elderly Chinese neighbor that you attended this past weekend.
